p: 7. Chronic HBV infections are usually asymptomatic so I am not quite sure if I understand what the authors are trying to say in the following sentence: “HBV infection in the general population in Africa is usually asymptomatic as none of the HBsAg positive adults assessed had signs of decompensated cirrhosis”. It is because chronic HBV infection is symptomless, that it is also referred to as a silent epidemic.
